fields.name: Matchmaker (Night):
fields.value:
Test if target player is compatible with last-checked player. Players are compatible if they win together.
Scorned is incompatible with everyone. ~~Royals are incompatible with each other.~~
- Starts with a random player.

fields.name: Nosey Servants (Night, 3 Uses):
fields.value:
Discover if a living player visited a dead player on the night they died.
- Doesn't count as visiting

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Royals clause doesn't apply. Is Town Investigative.
